entry.title: [Global][VoIP] - Change on SMS services
entry.content:
Jan 2, 08:51 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 20, 17:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 20, 16:40 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VOIP/Services/SMS offer.

Start time : 20/12/2024 17:00 UTC
End time : 02/01/2025 09:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We would like to inform you about new rules regarding Sender Management:

- Using a phone number as a sender is now prohibited. Such senders will therefore be removed. (This does not apply to SMS Virtual Numbers)
- Only non-accented alphabetic letters and numbers are allowed.
- Spaces and special characters are strictly prohibited.

As a result, OVHcloud will implement the following actions:
- Create and validate senders derived from existing ones that comply with these new rules.
- Allow, via the API, the use of old senders, which will be automatically translated into the new format.This translation will remain available several weeks to ensure compatibility, even after January 1st.
- Remove invalid senders before January 1st.

Customers impacted by these changes have already been contacted by email with further details.

Thank you for your understanding.

The OVHcloud Team
